title: What are the best jazz-funk albums? - Quora

response.answer_text: Some of my favorite jazz-funk albums (in random order): *Cellar Door Sessions Complete On the Corner Sessions Agharta All by the Miles Davis Group Headhunters and Man-Child by Herbie Hancock *Expansions by Lonnie Liston Smith *Swiss Movement by Les McCann and Eddie Harris Reach For It and Brazilian Love Affair by George Duke Ubiquity by Roy Ayers Mr Magic by Grover Washington School Days by Stanley Clarke

Manu Dibango - African Voodoo Jimmy McGriff - Blue to the bone Blue Mitchell - Graffity Blues Blue Mitchell - Blue's Blues Funk I.N.C. - S/T Byard Lancaster - Funny Funky Rib Grib Fela Kuti - No Agreement Lou Donaldson - Mr. Shing-a-Ling
